title: Disable ubuntu kernel auto update
content:
## Software & updates
![](https://i.imgur.com/DNIg1o6.png)

## Check current kernel (5.15.0-37)
```bash
uname -a
```
![](https://i.imgur.com/6E9xrFU.png)

## Show all kernel
```bash
dpkg -l | grep linux
```
![](https://i.imgur.com/eNusExx.png)

## Hold specific version kernel (5.15.0-37)
```bash
sudo apt-mark hold linux-headers-5.15.0-37 \
linux-headers-5.15.0-37-generic \
linux-image-5.15.0-37-generic \
linux-modules-5.15.0-37-generic \
linux-modules-extra-5.15.0-37-generic
```
## Check kernel hold 
```bash
dpkg --get-selections | grep hold
```
![](https://i.imgur.com/sAyz3JH.png)

Ref : [Ubuntu 禁止内核更新](https://blog.csdn.net/hanchaoo073092/article/details/118330986)
